fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -All of the ones that Townie With Common Sense (1814) has

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-All of the ones that Townie With Common Sense has
-You’re essentially an exact copy of Townie With Common Sense, but you’re evil. Also, you have no morals so their first attribute doesn’t apply.
-Evils will not kill you because you also have the uncommon sense to just dodge
-You also have the uncommon sense to board up your windows if you lock your door, so the last attribute also doesn’t apply
-You die if you’re roleocked though, because you have some sort of disease that prevents you from staying in your home all night
